name: Finish Line
description:
My submission for the WeeklyGameJam 72

The theme was "Finish Line"

This is the incredible story of Mike the hot-dog vendor who try to protect his new friend, the "finish line".

Commands 

WASD, arrow keys or left Joystick to move Mike
Spacebar or X to shoot hot-dogs

Credits

I have used a royalty free song from dl-sounds.com
I have used sound effects from sfbgames.com
And a logo template from Freepik

Made with Unity and love ♥

Fell free to comments and give me feedbacks.

Huge thanks to the WeeklyGameJam organisators and Yourbr0ther for his awesome stream.

Thx ♥
